Plot: Set in the 1930s, a black Jazz band rises in fame and popularity while becoming entangled in an intricate web of intrigue, mystery & suspense with the elite of London society.
Title: Dancing on the Edge
Actors: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Matthew Goode, Joanna Vanderham, Wunmi Mosaku
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 16 nominations.
